Law.name: Ceseda Article L.542-4
Law.description: Article of the Code of Entry and Residence of Foreigners and Right of Asylum (Ceseda) concerning the expulsion of individuals whose asylum applications have been rejected.

Concept.name: Security Risks
Concept.description: Risks associated with national security, which may affect the outcome of asylum procedures or the acceptance of refugees.

LegalDocument.name: CNDA Appeal Certificate
LegalDocument.description: A certificate required for filing an appeal against an asylum decision with the National Court of Asylum (CNDA).

Organization.name: CNR
Organization.description: An organization that supports political refugees, ethnic minorities, and religious minorities.

Organization.name: Asylum Courts
Organization.description: Courts responsible for adjudicating asylum cases and providing support to vulnerable refugee groups such as LGBTQ+, trafficking survivors, and health-vulnerable refugees.

Organization.name: Asylum Access
Organization.description: An organization that provides support to asylum seekers, students in exile, and LGBTQ+ refugees.

Organization.name: RESOME
Organization.description: An organization that supports students in exile and refugee children.

Organization.name: FTDA
Organization.description: An organization that supports families, war refugees, and internally displaced persons.

Organization.name: ABC
Organization.description: An organization that provides support to unaccompanied minors, women refugees, and disabled refugees.

Group.name: Refugee Families
Group.description: Families who have been granted refugee status and may require additional support.
